title: 07/26 Football: Dak/Eli Overrated, Redskins/Ravens camp previews
description:
Training camps are underway so Will Brinson and Nick Kostos break down some of the biggest news around the NFL, including the ugly Lucky Whitehead situation with the Cowboys (1:00 minute mark), whether the Cowboys offensive line will be as good as it was last year (8:00), the concerns the Colts should have with Andrew Luck's injury (10:20) and the Broncos extending John Elway and adding Gary Kubiak (17:00). Pete Prisco joins the show to talk about his overrated/underrated list of players in the NFL, explaining why guys like Dak Prescott, Eli Manning, Stephon Gilmore and Marshawn Lynch are on the overrated list (23:00) and Jason La Canfora stops by to preview the Redskins training camp, discuss whether Kirk Cousins contract will impact the locker room (42:00), as well as if Breshad Perriman can break out and Ravens training camp (51:40).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
